revision.text:
The '''Walt Disney World Resort''', also called '''Walt Disney World''' or '''Disney World''', is located in [[Florida]], [[United States|United States]].
== The owner == Walt Disney World Resort is owned and operated by the [[Walt Disney Parks and Resorts]] segment of [[The Walt Disney Company]]. There are four theme parks and two water parks there. In addition, there is downtown Disney with souvenir shops, restaurants, sports activities, and a hotel.
== Their four theme parks == [[Image:ORL-DisneyRRStat.JPG‎|thumb|right|200px|Disney Railroad Station at Magic Kingdom, Orlando FL]]
=== The Magic Kingdom === *The park which has dreams and a kingdom of magic as its theme.
=== Epcot === *The park which has future life and the [[history]] and [[culture]] of various countries as its theme.
=== Disney Hollywood Studios === *The park which has [[movies]] as its theme.
=== Disney [[animal]] kingdom === *The park which has animals as its theme.
